response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe would significantly benefit your business. Given its high value and potential impact on your operations, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $14,000. This is a special opportunity tailored to recognize your discerning taste and commitment to excellence in your field. Please let me know if this offer meets your expectations and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 14000}
